sentences.en: Angelo laid the gun carefully on the table, in the midst of brochures and other papers.
sentences.cn: 安杰洛小心翼翼地把枪放在桌上的一堆手册和文件中间。

sentences.en: Eleanor arrived in the midst of a blizzard.
sentences.cn: 埃莉诺在暴风雪大作时到达。

sentences.en: He fought bravely in the midst of the battle.
sentences.cn: 他在那次战役中奋勇作战.

sentences.en: he left his flat in the midst of a rainstorm.
sentences.cn: 他在暴雨中离开了公寓。

sentences.en: He rushed into the midst of the hooligans and laid about him fearlessly.
sentences.cn: 他冲到那群恶棍中间,毫无畏惧地向四面八方乱打.

sentences.en: He wanted the picnic to be in the midst of the forest.
I fear we have an enemy in our midst.
sentences.cn: 我担心我们中间有内奸。

sentences.en: I greatly esteem your message in the midst of our hard struggle.
sentences.cn: 您在我们奋力抗争时发来的电文让我充满了敬意。

sentences.en: Many were surprised to see him exposed like this in the midst of a large crowd.
sentences.cn: 许多人看到他像这样暴露在一大群人中间都非常吃惊。

sentences.en: She stood preening in their midst, delighted with the attention.
sentences.cn: 她得意洋洋地站在他们中间，为受人瞩目而高兴。

sentences.en: Such beauty was unexpected in the midst of the city.
sentences.cn: 市中心有这样的美景真是出乎意料。

sentences.en: The immaculately tended gardens are an oasis in the midst of Cairo's urban sprawl.
sentences.cn: 在开罗不断扩张的都市版图内，这些被悉心照料的花园成了一片世外桃源。

sentences.en: The knight felt no fear in the midst of battle.
sentences.cn: 那武士在战斗中毫不感到惧怕.

sentences.en: The students were in the midst of a lively discussion when the teacher came in.
sentences.cn: 正当同学们热烈讨论的时候,老师进来了.

sentences.en: There is a thief in our midst.
This growing poverty in the midst of growing poverty constitutes a permanent menace to peace.
sentences.cn: 在这种不断增长的贫困中正在增长着的贫困,构成了对和平的永久的威胁.

sentences.en: We are in the midst of one of the worst recessions for many, many years.
sentences.cn: 我们正处在多年来最严重的一次经济衰退之中。

sentences.en: We were sitting in the midst of an elegant and well-dressed audience.
sentences.cn: 我们坐在一群举止优雅、衣着考究的观众中间。

phrases.phrase: in our (或 your, their，等) midst
phrases.tran_cn: 在我们（或你们、他们）当中
